Name: Living Burning Hands
Damage Resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
Condition Immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone
Traits: Amorphous. The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Magic Resistance. The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
Actions: Magical Strike. Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) fire damage. Spell Mimicry (Recharge 5–6). The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
